mapper.select: SELECT p.*, c.codeNm as 'categoryNm' FROM product p INNER JOIN code c ON c.codeGbn='PRODUCT' AND c.code=p.categoryCd WHERE delId is null AND delDt is null ORDER BY p.categoryCd, p.productNm
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product values(null, #{productNm}, #{price}, #{description}, #{categoryCd}, #{filePath}, #{insId}, now(), #{updId}, now(), null, null);
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET productNm=#{productNm}, price=#{price}, description=#{description}, categoryCd=#{categoryCd}, filePath=#{filePath}, updId=#{updId}, updDt=now() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE product SET delId=#{delId}, delDt=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orderInfo WHERE productId=#{productId} AND insId=#{userId} AND deliveryCd!='01' AND deliveryCd is not null;

SELECT p.*, (SELECT avg(rating) FROM comment cm WHERE p.id=cm.productId AND delId is null GROUP BY productId) as ratingAvg , c.codeNm categoryNm, s.id saleId, s.amount, s.unitCd, s.startDate, s.endDate FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN sale s ON p.id=s.productId and endDate>=#{today} JOIN code c ON c.codeGbn='PRODUCT' and c.code=p.categoryCd WHERE delId is null ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 0, 6
